structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXVI. CLIMATE CHANGE ADVISORY TASK FORCE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1946. Physical facilities, staff and supplies.
The County shall provide the CCATF with appropriate meeting facilities, together with necessary supplies and equipment.
The County Manager shall provide necessary staffing assistance to the CCATF.
The CCATF may request the Board to provide such other specialized consulting expertise as it may determine are necessary from time to time.
